Most Illustrious Sir

By virtue of your office of the 4th of the current month, which I received last night, Your Excellency has São Gabriel attached. On this occasion I beg Your Excellency Joaquim de Faria Correia or Major Manuel Pires to take charge of the draft and shipment of the herds of cattle that must leave from that district for Montevideo, coming from the loan I promoted and the free gift that several citizens have voluntarily offered for the expenses of the present struggle for our independence; for which I direct the attached letters to Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency  
Secretary of the Treasury in Piratini, January 9, 1839.  
Domingos José de Almeida

Republic Secretariat  
Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira, Commander of the Right Division.  
From the Ministry of the Treasury

In duplicate.
